thread.title: Koch Brothers Eye Marco Rubio for $1 Billion Prize
thread.title_full: Koch Brothers Eye Marco Rubio for $1 Billion Prize

author: Taegan Goddard
title: Koch Brothers Eye Marco Rubio for $1 Billion Prize
text:
Koch Brothers Eye Marco Rubio for $1 Billion Prize October 8, 2015 By Taegan Goddard 0 Comments 
New York Daily News : “Slowly but surely, the GOP is narrowing down its list of presidential candidates. The big prize — aside from the presidency itself — is still the nearly $1 billion contribution the kingmaking Koch brothers, Charles and David, will reportedly throw behind the conservative agenda next year. According to a political insider who ran into David Koch at a recent event in Manhattan, Florida Sen. Rubio is the front-runner for dough now that Wisconsin Gov. Scott Walker is out of the race.” Related Posts Never miss a Political Wire post Your email address: * Please enter all required fields Correct invalid entries
